food.name: Pasta
food.definition: A type of food made from wheat flour and water, typically mixed with eggs and formed into various shapes, then boiled or baked.

food.name: Sushi
food.definition: A Japanese dish consisting of small balls or rolls of vinegar-flavored cold cooked rice served with a garnish of vegetables, egg, or raw seafood.

food.name: Burger
food.definition: A sandwich consisting of a grilled or fried patty of ground meat, usually beef, topped with various condiments and served on a bun.

food.name: Pizza
food.definition: An Italian dish consisting of a flat, round base of dough topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various other ingredients, typically baked in an oven.

food.name: Taco
food.definition: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients, such as beef, chicken, cheese, beans, lettuce, and salsa.

food.name: Sausage
food.definition: A type of seasoned meat, typically made from pork, beef, or poultry, and usually served grilled or fried as a breakfast or lunch food.

food.name: Curry
food.definition: A dish originating in the Indian subcontinent, consisting of meat, fish, vegetables, or fruit cooked in a sauce or gravy with various spices.

food.name: Sushi
food.definition: A Japanese dish consisting of small balls or rolls of vinegar-flavored cold cooked rice served with a garnish of vegetables, egg, or raw seafood.

food.name: Ice Cream
food.definition: A frozen dessert made from milk or cream and sugar, typically flavored with fruit, chocolate, or other ingredients.

food.name: Steak
food.definition: A slice of meat, typically beef, cooked by grilling or frying.

food.name: Butter
food.definition: A dairy product made from milk or cream, typically used as a spread or for cooking and baking.

food.name: Bread
food.definition: A staple food made from flour, water, and yeast, often baked in an oven.

food.name: Cheese
food.definition: A dairy product made from milk curds, often used as a topping or ingredient in dishes.

food.name: Eggs
food.definition: The oval reproductive body laid by birds, typically used in cooking and baking.

food.name: Rice
food.definition: A cereal grain used as a staple food in many cultures, often boiled or steamed and served as a side dish or in dishes such as sushi.

food.name: Potato
food.definition: A starchy root vegetable often boiled, baked, or fried and served as a side dish or ingredient in dishes such as mashed potatoes or potato salad.

food.name: Cooking
food.definition: The process of preparing food for consumption by applying heat, often using techniques such as baking, frying, or boiling.

food.name: Menu
food.definition: A list of dishes available at a restaurant or for a meal, typically including appetizers, entrees, and desserts.

food.name: Recipe
food.definition: A set of instructions for preparing a particular dish, including a list of ingredients and the steps involved in cooking or baking it.

food.name: Ingredient
food.definition: Any of the foods or substances that are combined to make a particular dish.
